name: Greater Drow Nobility
prerequisiteFormula: all(@cha_score >= 13, @feat:drow_nobility, @feat:improved_drow_nobility, "Able to use drow spell-like abilities", @race:drow)

description.text: You have mastered the lesser spell-like abilities of the drow, demonstrating true nobility.

sections.Benefit: Your detect magic spell-like ability is now constant. You may use your dancing lights, deeper darkness, faerie fire, feather fall, and levitate spell-like abilities at will.
